chunk:
Plaine Products Face Moisturizer

Brand: Plaine Products

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aloe barbadensis Leaf Juice, Carthamus Tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, Cetearyl Olivate & Sorbitan Olivate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Microcrystalline Cellulose and Algin, Glycerin, Allantoin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Sclerotium Gum,

Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Microcrystalline Cellulose and Algin, Glycerin, Allantoin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Sclerotium Gum, Sorbitan Caprylate (and) Propanediol (and) Benzoic Acid, Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Fruit Oil ,Tocopheryl Acetate. Grapefruit Bellini Natural Fragrance
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
